name: recn
description: Blazing fast. Tiny size. The last one className helper.

scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run compile && npm run compress
scripts.compress: uglifyjs --compress --mangle -o lib/react.min.js lib/react.js && uglifyjs --compress --mangle -o lib/origin.min.js lib/origin.js && uglifyjs --compress --mangle -o lib/recn.min.js lib/recn.js

author: Anton Vinogradov <winogradovaa@gmail.com>
